availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Paducah,Kentucky, lawyer. Virginia native. Married to Ellen Smith Ratcliffe in Jefferson County, Kentucky on October 18, 1845. Father of Mary, Willey, Kate, Lawrance, and Charley Ratcliffe. Lawyer in Paducah, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, District 2, p. 154.
Find A Grave, Richard S. Ratcliffe (1817-1878), Find A Grave Memorial # 84326845, https://www.findagrave.com/84326845 (accessed 12 May 2017).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000818480.
